title: HoP 354 - Greed is Good - Economics in the Italian Renaissance
itunes:title: HoP 354 - Greed is Good - Economics in the Italian Renaissance
description: Leon Battista Alberti, Benedetto Cotrugli, and Poggio Bracciolini grapple with the moral and conceptual problems raised by the prospect of people getting filthy rich.
content:encoded: Leon Battista Alberti, Benedetto Cotrugli, and Poggio Bracciolini grapple with the moral and conceptual problems raised by the prospect of people getting filthy rich.
